name: C. Sonya and Problem Wihtout a Legend
statement:
Sonya was unable to think of a story for this problem, so here comes the
formal description.You are given the array containing positive integers.
At one turn you can pick any element and increase or decrease it by .
The goal is the make the array strictly increasing by making the minimum
possible number of operations. You are allowed to change elements in any
way, they can become negative or equal to .
